scripts.build: npm run build-css && npm run build-js && npm run build-vr && npm run build-resource-list
scripts.build-css: npm run make-css-folder && node-sass sass/ -o static/styles && npm run clean-css
scripts.build-vr: npm run build-vr-deps && npm run copy-vr-deps && npm run build-vr-dev && babel static/scripts/webvr.js --presets babel-preset-babili --out-file static/scripts/webvr.js
scripts.build-vr-deps: (cd scripts/third_party/vrview && npm run build && npm run build-api)
scripts.watch: npm run build && parallelshell "npm run watch-sass" "npm run watch-js"
scripts.watch-sass: npm run make-css-folder && node-sass -w sass/ -o static/styles
scripts.release: npm run bump && npm run build && npm run optimize-images
